title: Transparent Interconnection of Lots of Links (TRILL) Operations, Administration, and Maintenance (OAM) Framework
source: Transparent Interconnection of Lots of Links INT
abstract:
This document specifies a reference framework for Operations,
Administration, and Maintenance (OAM) in Transparent Interconnection of Lots
of Links (TRILL) networks.  The focus of the document is on the fault and
performance management aspects of TRILL OAM.
